title: upload button "up arrow" confusing, looks like "go to parent dir"
body:
### expected behaviour
upload button should be easy to distinguish.

### actual behaviour
when i see the upload button which is a single "up arrow", i tend to automatically click on it believing it's a "go to parent directory" button

![image](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/277525/979633/cf7ce3f4-071c-11e3-94ba-2bab1287a90c.png)

### steps to reproduce
1. open the files app
2. go into a subdirectory
3. look at the navigation bar

### server configuration
owncloud version: 6.0 pre alpha

### suggested fixes
add the text "upload" behind the arrow
use another icon, for example an up arrow with a file icon in the background.
or an arrow with a cloud, like this one: http://fortawesome.github.io/font-awesome/icon/cloud-upload/
